components.description:
A person tipping their hand by their shoulder as if they’re carrying a tray of drinks or flipping their hair. Originally called Information Desk Person.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.

While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman. Google’s 2014 design shows a blob wearing white gloves and a pillbox hat. Microsoft’s 2015 design shows a woman doing this gesture while winking, a facial expression that further reinforces the sassy and sarcastic uses of this emoji.
components.title: Information Desk Person

description:
A person tipping their hand by their shoulder as if they’re carrying a tray of drinks or flipping their hair. Originally called Information Desk Person.

This emoji is commonly used to express sassiness or sarcasm.

While no gender is specified, many early designs displayed this emoji as a woman. Google’s 2014 design shows a blob wearing white gloves and a pillbox hat. Microsoft’s 2015 design shows a woman doing this gesture while winking, a facial expression that further reinforces the sassy and sarcastic uses of this emoji.
title: Information Desk Person

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Role symbol

bn:00103335a: Not showing due respect; impertinent; bold-faced
Not showing due respect; impertinent; bold-faced.

bn:00104094a: Providing assistance or serving a useful function
Providing assistance or serving a useful function.

bn:00102884a: Of, relating to, or denoting the sex which is generally characterized as the one associated with the larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).
Being the sex (of plant or animal) that produces fertilizable gametes (ova) from which offspring develop
Belonging to the sex with larger, fertilizable gametes.

Belonging to the sex which typically produces eggs, which in humans and most other mammals is typically the one which has XX chromosomes; belonging to the sex which has larger gametes (for species which have two sexes and for which this distinction can be made).

bn:00088732v: To express something by a gesture or gestures.
To say or express through gestures.
Show, express or direct through movement
To show, express or direct through movements.

bn:00083289v: To signal (someone or something) with a waving movement.
Signal with the hands or nod
To signal with a waving movement.
To signal with the hands or nod.

bn:00082481v: Give help or assistance; be of service
To give assistance or aid to.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00046516n: A person, especially as one among many.
An individual is a person or a specific object.
A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
A human; someone susceptible to death.

A person is a being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood, which in turn is defined differently by different authors in different disciplines, and by different cultures in different times and places.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood
Abstract term defining a being, e.g. a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood (not for use with "instance of" [P31], instead use "human" [Q5])
An individual; usually a human being.

bn:00034453n: A young female human; (in contrast to boy), a female child or young adult.
A title of respect for a young woman (usually unmarried) with or without a name used.
A young female person, usually a child or teenager.
A girl is any female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.
A girl is a female human from birth through childhood and adolescence to attainment of adulthood when she becomes a woman.

bn:00042759n: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.

bn:00049666n: A polite name for any woman

bn:13817509n: A teenager, a person between 13 and 19 years old.
A person between 13 and 19 years old.
Person aged between thirteen and nineteen.
Literally, a person from thirteen to nineteen who is in their teens; an adolescent.
